ComponentGraphTest

Method Detail

testComponentGraph

public void testComponentGraph()
Minimal test creating a graph with two nodes. Nodes are inserted with an edge, where one component is expected. Then the edge is removed, and we expect zero components, because free-floating nodes are removed.
